title: Sainz explains 'biggest' struggle in adapting to Williams F1 car
summary: Carlos Sainz has pinpointed the area he is most getting to grips with in his new Williams F1 car

qa_pairs.question: Which team is Carlos Sainz currently adapting to in Formula 1?
What is a common challenge drivers face when switching teams in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Adapting to the new car's handling and performance characteristics
wrong_options: Getting used to the team’s communication style

qa_pairs.question: Who is responsible for developing the car that drivers like Carlos Sainz must adapt to?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The engineering team of the respective Formula 1 team
